s.text: 2. "If it can prevent children or other New Yorkers from being maimed, disfigured, or killed, it will serve its purpose."

"This is great news for the millions of Americans who are not getting enough physical activity," says Dr. Claude Lenfant.
It's easy to overstate the new athletics as a force for social change, but don't count on surfers opposing the president's ludicrous, Reagan-revival anti-missile plan.
It's easy to overstate the new athletics as a force for social change, but don't count on surfers opposing the president's ludicrous, Reagan-revival anti-missile plan.

The studies (noncontroversial, nonpolitical, and in no way intended to affect the impeachment process) found that while moderate exercise does not burn many calories, it is beneficial to the one in four Americans who spend most of their time sitting.
